messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a swarm of rodents have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Remember to max out all sensors guys, so you stay safe

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is the HoP speeking, the telecoms are down for some reason, grab a radio so you may talk

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HoP here, i beleve that Ariana is not a trator and thus i will suport her through all means except for killing

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello, Tristan Quilt is dead, and I, Black Geezus, am your new HoP

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
